title: Te Papa Store
subText: Rest and recharge at one of our cafes, then browse our shops for the perfect gift or souvenir.
when: Open 10am–5pm, every day of the year

paragraph.title: NULL
paragraph.text: On Level 2 you’ll find a wide selection of World War I and Gallipoli merchandise, including an extensive range of books. We also have educational and fun children’s books.

paragraph.title: NULL
paragraph.text: Te Papa Store is a great choice for wedding registers and corporate gifts too.
